summary: This document is an email chain between FBI personnel in New York, forwarding the official statement from the Manhattan U.S. Attorney regarding the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein. The chain discusses the statement's utility in addressing the need to reach out to victims and affirms the ongoing investigative commitment.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Issued the official statement on the death of Jeffrey Epstein, which is being forwarded and discussed within the FBI email chain.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the U.S. Attorney's statement; his death is announced and discussed.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein Announced
events.description: The Manhattan U.S. Attorney issues a formal statement regarding the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The Manhattan U.S. Attorney, Geoffrey Berman, issued an official statement on August 10, 2019, regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
The statement was forwarded internally among FBI personnel in New York, indicating coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI.

An FBI agent notes the statement 'addresses our need to reach out to vics' (victims) and affirms 'There is no question what we're doing,' suggesting an ongoing victim outreach and investigative effort following Epstein's death.
